# tests golang.org/issue/43830

[!cgo] skip 'skipping test without cgo'
[!exec:gcc] skip 'skipping test without gcc present'
[openbsd] env CC='clang'
[!openbsd] env CC=`gcc`

env CGO_CFLAGS='-flto -ffat-lto-objects'

go build main.go

-- main.go --

package main

import "fmt"

// #include "hello.h"
import "C"

func main() {
	hello := C.hello
	fmt.Printf("%v\n", hello)
}

-- hello.h --

#include <stdio.h>

void hello(void) {
  printf("hello\n");
}
